solution_line_template: If each of them ate {slices_per_person} slices, and the pizza only has {total_slices} slices, that means there could only have been {total_slices}/{slices_per_person} = <<{total_slices}/{slices_per_person}={total_people_eating}>>{total_people_eating} people eating
Solving for F we have {total_people_eating}-{ron_count} = F
